verbs.description: The Associated Press [V: is] reporting that President Donald Trump may pardon deceased boxing great Muhammad Ali . Addressing questions from reporters before departing from for the G7 summit in Canada , Trump expressed that he was considering pardoning many other people including the boxing legend and activist Ali . It ’s unclear exactly what Trump would be pardoning Muhammad …
